*div1 type="summary"* *p*James F. Perry to Austin, February 14, 1825. Business. Presidental election. Family news.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mine a Burton*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-14-1825">Feby 14th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*We received your letter of the *date_mentioned n="12-17-1824">17th of December last*/date_mentioned* about *date_mentioned n="02-04-1825">ten days since*/date_mentioned* and at your request I now address you. *person_mentioned*Brown Austin*/person_mentioned* started from *location_mentioned*Herculaneum*/location_mentioned* about the *date_mentioned n="11-03-1824">3d day of November*/date_mentioned* on the *date_mentioned n="11-23-1824">23d*/date_mentioned* of the same month he wrote to us from *location_mentioned*Natchez*/location_mentioned*— he had got there safe and well and I expect he is with you long ere this. We are anxiously looking every mail for a letter from him from *location_mentioned*Natchetoches*/location_mentioned*. With respect to your sister and myself moving to that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* we have not yet come to any determination. I have some thoughts of visiting your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* and if I am pleased with it we may move there but I have some Scrouples to surmount before, I can get my own consent to leave my *location_mentioned*native Country*/location_mentioned*, to leave the best Government in the world for a strange *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* and strange Laws causes cerious reflections, but perhaps on visiting the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* and becoming acquénted with your Laws and your Government Settles down on Republican principles as there is now every prospect that it will I may become reconciled to change *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. I will now state to you our prospects, with industery and econemy I know we can make an independent living here but I never expect to be able to live here in affluence or to make a fortune. I beleive it was before you left this *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* that *person_mentioned*Samuel Perry*/person_mentioned* and myself entered into *person_mentioned*partnership*/person_mentioned*—he had all the capital I get the one third of the profets. We are still doing business, on the same footing, and we have made some money from a rough calculation we made *date_mentioned n="02-xx-1824">about a year ago*/date_mentioned* I think I may safely state that if a dividend was now made my part would amount to from 8 to 10,000 Dollars in *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned* goods money and Lands, which would be a tolarable start in a new *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Saml*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Myself*/person_mentioned* have made no new arrangement since my marage but I expect we will have to soon. I have not purchased a house yet as I dont wish to purchase untill we determine where to settle permantly as I am not fond of moving. Now I have gave you an Idea of our curcumstances and prospects I wish you to write to me your Ideas of that *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*both with regard to it[s] government and Laws and its natural advantages do you think with what we could take with us and with industry and economy that we could make a fortune in a few years give us your opinion if you advise me I will visit your *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned* but unless I thought we could better our cituation I would rather live here as I feel much attached to our *location_mentioned*native country*/location_mentioned* and Laws, it would certainly be my wish to live near you if it could be so for all our benefits. *person_mentioned*Chester Ashley*/person_mentioned* is now in this *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*. I have not yet seen him, but expect to see him before he returns and will make inquiery respecting the*location_mentioned* little Rock*/location_mentioned* Business. With respect to the *location_mentioned*Mine A Burton Property*/location_mentioned* I can not at this time give you much satisfaction respecting it. *person_mentioned*Price*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Ruggles*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*W. M*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*J Perry,*/person_mentioned* has a lawsute pending in the *person_mentioned*supreme Court*/person_mentioned* respecting 250 acres which your *person_mentioned*Father */person_mentioned*conveyed to *person_mentioned*Ruggles*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*James Bryan*/person_mentioned* to secure them for being his security in *location_mentioned*Bank*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Bryan*/person_mentioned* sold his part to *person_mentioned*W M*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*J Perry*/person_mentioned*.*person_mentioned* Price*/person_mentioned* obtained a judgment against *person_mentioned*Ruggles*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Perry*/person_mentioned* for 3,500 Dollars it was removed to the *person_mentioned*Supreme Court*/person_mentioned* and will be tryed I expect in *date_mentioned n="05-xx-1826">May next*/date_mentioned*— *person_mentioned*Perry and Ruggles Lawyers*/person_mentioned* say that your *person_mentioned*Fathers Heirs*/person_mentioned* could recover the whole or Part of the *location_mentioned*tract */location_mentioned*so I am told but I intend consulting *person_mentioned*Judge Cook*/person_mentioned* (who is one of them and Knowes all about the situation of it) as soon as I can see him and I will than give you a more satisfactory acfc of it. Our *person_mentioned*Legislature */person_mentioned*is now in Session and has been ever since the *date_mentioned n="11-03-1824">3d monday in November*/date_mentioned* and is not expected to rise before the *date_mentioned n="02-26-1825">26th*/date_mentioned* or *date_mentioned n="02-26-1825">26th Istant*/date_mentioned*. they are reviseing the whole code of Laws and are making many very material alterations whether for the better or worse time will determine the last act we had from *person_mentioned*Saml Perry*/person_mentioned* who is still a *person_mentioned*member of the senate*/person_mentioned* he states they had passed 140 laws and had 30 or 40 more to act on Your old Friend *person_mentioned*Judge Benton*/person_mentioned* has been re- elected to the *person_mentioned*U. S. Senate*/person_mentioned* not with standing the most outrageous Slander was circulated against him by his *person_mentioned*enemies */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Rectors*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Benton*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Govnr Mc Nair*/person_mentioned* and others it is not yet known who will be our next *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*went to the *person_mentioned*house of Representatives*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Jackson*/person_mentioned* had the highest vote *person_mentioned*Adams*/person_mentioned* next and *person_mentioned*Crawford*/person_mentioned* next *person_mentioned*Clay*/person_mentioned* was left out *person_mentioned*Crawford*/person_mentioned*s friends have no hopes the contest will be between *person_mentioned*Jackson*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Adams*/person_mentioned*.
*/p**p*There is now here an *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*to lease the *location_mentioned*U. S. Lead mines*/location_mentioned* he has granted some leases, the *person_mentioned*miners*/person_mentioned* are not willing to Submit he leases under a Law of *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1807">1807 */date_mentioned*which is thought here does not autherise the leasing of them, if his *location_mentioned*leases */location_mentioned*are inforsed it will make a great alteration in the Lead business I think for the worse the *location_mentioned*leases*/location_mentioned* are for 3 years. *person_mentioned*Mrs Henry Elliott*/person_mentioned* is in this place teaching *location_mentioned*school*/location_mentioned* from her present prospects she expects to have a large *location_mentioned*School*/location_mentioned* against next *date_mentioned n="summer- 1825">summer*/date_mentioned*. She wishes to be remembered to you. Your *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Children */person_mentioned*are well *person_mentioned*Joel*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned* are going to School *person_mentioned*Guy*/person_mentioned* and*person_mentioned* Mary*/person_mentioned* Grow finely. Write to us by every oppertunity as we are always anxtious to here from you.*person_mentioned* Wm*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Jn° Perry*/person_mentioned* are well *person_mentioned*Will*/person_mentioned* has no wife and *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned* has no Children. *person_mentioned*Mrs Sam1 Perry*/person_mentioned* has been in *location_mentioned*St Louis*/location_mentioned* all winter with her *person_mentioned*Daughter */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mrs Farris*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Sam1*/person_mentioned* writes to us offin they are all well a Brother of the Handy which *person_mentioned*Saml*/person_mentioned* Shot made an attempt to Shoot *person_mentioned*Saml */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*St Louis */location_mentioned*not long since but *person_mentioned*Saml*/person_mentioned* jumped in on him and took his pistol from [him] prevented him from shooting and let him go again. Old *person_mentioned*Bissel*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Price*/person_mentioned* are Blamed for seting him on.*person_mentioned* Emily */person_mentioned*joins me in our Best wishes for your wellfare and prosperity also give our best respect to your *person_mentioned*Brother Brown*/person_mentioned* and permit me to subscribe myself your *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* */p* *p**person_mentioned*Jas F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*In your next please direct us how to direct our letters if this is not the right */p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Co1- Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**location_mentioned* Rio Brazos */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned* To the Care of *person_mentioned*Jared Cable Esqr*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Natchitoches*/location_mentioned*—¦*/p* */div1*
